__e: We're moving around so much because she's always looking for work, and I guess when you meet new people, it's just easier to say that she's a lawyer 'cause it's, like, respectable
Monies and valuables stolen by Bunty and Babli I think they had told me the truth about going back... to live respectable, honest lives like their parents
Then, on my own, I told myself it was enough if I wanted to have a decent life and if I didn't want to die young.
